spec_data.Name: libNX_Xinerama
spec_data.Description:
Xinerama is an extension to the X Window System which enables
multi-headed X applications and window managers to use two or more
physical displays as one large virtual display.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 09:08:49 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Xinerama extension to the NX Protocol
